pages.text: $(l)Yggdrasil Branch$() is a rare and unique artifact, hewn directly from the cosmic tree itself. $(br2)This sacred relic allows its bearer to forge invisible bonds between allies, shielding them from harm inflicted by your divine relics. $(br2)$(l)Abilities:$()$(li)$(l)Protective Link:$() This magical bond safeguards your ally from damage caused by your divine relics.$(br2)It is worth noting that the $(l)Protective Link$() does not shield against ordinary damage, such as left-mouse-button-click strikes from any weapon, but solely against the extraordinary forces, such as shockwaves or thrown weapons, conjured by the divine relics.

pages.title: Obtaining
pages.text: This legendary relic can only be obtained through trade with the masterful Huldra brothers, $(l)Brok and Sindri$().
